headline: Ascom appoints David Hale as new CEO
summary: Picture David Hale New CEO of Ascom Holding AG Ad hoc announcement pursuant to Art. 53 LRBaar, Switzerland, December 9, 2025 David Hale, an executive leader with a proven track record and over two decades of technology and industrial expertise, has been appointed by the Board of Directors of Ascom Holding AG as the new CEO of the Ascom Group. David Hale will join Ascom on February 4, 2026. Michael Reitermann will step down as interim CEO at that time and remain an ordinary member of the Board of
